item.description:
Would you like to visit the Fruitlands Museum with the book group members in August? On August 19, there will be the exhibit opening of three artists from Worcester; Scott Erb, Cynthia Woehrle and Brian Burris.

Visceral Murmurs Exhibit Opening Sun, 08/19/2012 - 6:00pm Cost: Free Visceral Murmurers includes three artists: photographs by Scott Erb and paintings by Cynthia Woehrle and Brian Burris. An exhibition of their combined works will show not only how each has independently responded to the Fruitlands setting but also how they have inspired each otherâ€™s work. Meet the artists and enjoy refreshments.

http://www.fruitlands.org/
item.name: Fruitlands Museum visit
